ygData.subject: Re: Bard's Instruments
ygData.msgSnippet: I was under the impression that the more advanced instruments (i.e. more expensive ones or ones found on monsters) would have a higher multiplier on songs.
ygData.messageBody:
I was under the impression that the more "advanced" instruments (i.e. more
expensive ones or ones found on monsters) would have a higher multiplier on
songs. Like a harp found on a creature would mean that healing went up
higher than using a mandolin.

Taluvil
----- Original Message -----
From: Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 <g4mntofcr@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, August 03, 1999 9:08 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard's Instruments


> From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
> There are four types of bard instruments: drum, lute/mandolin, flute and
> horn. All can be bought at a bards guild for relatively inexpensive
> amounts. The basic instruments have no powers other than increasing the
> effects of songs that use them. Right click on a song scroll before you
> scribe it to determine which instrument it uses.
>
> For unique bard instruments, a battle drum can be found in Mistmoore. An
> earlier post on this list said you run faster with Selo's playing if you
> have a battle drum equipped. Other than that I do not know if it confers
> any other bonuses. A Lute of the Gypsy Princess can also be found in
> Mistmoore but I believe it is a quest item and does not offer any bonuses
> either.
>
> Galtin of E'ci
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Jamie [SMTP:bribed@...]
> > Sent: Tuesday, August 03, 1999 2:48 PM
> > To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > Subject: [eqbards] Bard's Instruments
> >
> > From: "Jamie" <bribed@...>
> >
> > I've been looking for a listing of instruments, their powers and where
to
> > find them (or how much to pay for em) but I can't find any...maybe we
> > could
> > compile a list ourselves...anyone have any info?
> >
> >
> > Taluvil, 12th bard
